overview: When a group of gold prospectors decide to take the beautiful women of pleasure of the Fandango Saloon away from a lecherous gang of outlaws, the ornery crooks donâ€™t take it so easily. Shootings and kidnappings ensue, with the gals and good guys battling against the nasty criminals.
tagline: The Home of Hard Men... And Easy Women!
title: Fandango
